item.title: Spending output of a low-fee transaction by following with higher-fee transaction
item.description:
Spending output of a low-fee transaction by following with higher-fee transaction

Suppose I broadcast a transaction A with very low (or zero) fee. Normally, it would take a long time to confirm. Suppose, then I broadcast another transaction B that spends a (yet unconfirmed) outp...

item.title: Online Platforms Remain Vulnerable To Fundamental Exploits
item.description:
Online Platforms Remain Vulnerable To Fundamental Exploits

After multiple years of internet attacks, one would come to expect certain vectors are no longer possible to exploit. Unfortunately, that is not always the case, as SQL injection attacks remain one of the most common threats to website owners. In fact, anything remotely linked to a database is vulnerable to SQL injections.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Riding Out The Gains - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Riding Out The Gains - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at the levels in focus for today's bitcoin price watch intraday strategy. In yesterday evening's analysis, we focused on the relatively flat action we have seen in the bitcoin price across the last few days, and commented that this might continue as we head into the close of the week.

item.title: How can the blockchain improve the way corporations raise their capital?
item.description:
How can the blockchain improve the way corporations raise their capital?

Answer: The Blockchain could allow a company with enough credibility to emit directly new shares. Theoretically, a company like Apple could do a share emission (basically "Apple money") in the Blockchain without going through the Nasdaq or the Stock exchange. Transactions would be 1)quicker 2) ac...

item.title: Royal Capital Pro: The Brand New Forex Broker
item.description:
Royal Capital Pro: The Brand New Forex Broker

Currently serving an increasing number of clients, Royal Capital Pro has made it its mission to offer the best trading services on the market. The company offers full trading functionality (including trading indices, currencies, equities, and commodities) through some of the market's top trading platforms. One of them is the reputable Metatrader 4 (MT4), a platform already used and trusted by millions of traders globally.

item.title: What's the best place to buy ethereum for USD?
item.description:
What's the best place to buy ethereum for USD?

Answer: "best" is a bit subjective, but kraken.com will probably do what you're looking for, and was one of the first to offer Ether. NB. The crypto coin is called "Ether" , not "Ethereum"

item.title: What is the best bitcoin wallet?
item.description:
What is the best bitcoin wallet?

item.title: Review: Bitmain AntMiner S9 First 16nm ASIC to Market Miner - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Review: Bitmain AntMiner S9 First 16nm ASIC to Market Miner - Bitcoinist.net

Bitmain has long led the industry not only in ASIC development but also in making sure they are available to more than just a few big customers. The other hallmark of Bitmain is they announce a new miner only when they are nearly ready to ship. No pre-ordering and long waits.

item.title: F2Pool Votes on 8MB Blocks To Alleviate Bitcoin Congestion
item.description:
F2Pool Votes on 8MB Blocks To Alleviate Bitcoin Congestion

Now that the Bitcoin price has been skyrocketing, more transactions are taking place on the network as well. Similar to what happened a few months ago, network congestion is taking place once again. Bitcoin Core developers are being scrutinized once again for their seemingly unwillingness to up the block size anytime soon.
